scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace model-railroad-inventory-server dev" "yarn workspace model-railroad-inventory-client dev"
scripts.debug: concurrently "yarn workspace model-railroad-inventory-server debug" "yarn workspace model-railroad-inventory-client dev" "node wait-and-open.js"
scripts.build: yarn workspace model-railroad-inventory-server build && yarn workspace model-railroad-inventory-client build
